dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1529 IH: Student Aid Expansion Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Castro of Texas (for himself and Mr. Hinojosa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exempt certain State-provided loan programs from being subject to preferred lender arrangement requirements.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Student Aid Expansion Act of 2013.

section.header: Exemption of certain State-provided loan programs from preferred lender arrangement requirements
section.text: Section 151(8)(B) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1019(8)(B)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end;
in clause (ii), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: arrangements or agreements with respect to interest-free private education loans that are provided and administered by a State and that are eligible for complete forgiveness under conditions determined by such State.
